summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account from August 1, 2018, to August 31, 2018. It details the beginning and ending balances, deposits, withdrawals, and interest payments during this period, highlighting a significant cash transfer of $5,000,000.00.

events.title: Account Summary Period
events.description: Summary of account transactions and balances for the month of August 2018.

events.title: Cash Transfer
events.description: A cash transfer of $5,000,000.00 was made from the account.

events.title: Interest Payment
events.description: An interest payment of $59,083.25 was credited to the account.

locations: Deutsche Bank AG, 60 Wall Street, New York, NY 10005
The Haze Trust, 6100 Red 1100E Quarter, 113 St, Thomas 00802, United States Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $35,642,184.04 and an ending balance of $35,642,184.04 as of August 31, 2018.
A significant cash transfer of $5,000,000.00 occurred on August 20, 2018.
An interest payment of $59,083.25 was credited to the account on August 31, 2018.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors on the account statement.
The account is not FDIC insured and is subject to the German Deposit Guarantee Act.
